abstract: Dick Cook, the long-time chairman of Walt Disney Studios, has resigned.
snippet: Dick Cook, the long-time chairman of Walt Disney Studios, has resigned.
lead_paragraph: Dick Cook, the longtime chairman of Walt Disney Studios, has resigned, according to the studio. Mr. Cook, Disney’s highest-ranking film executive, has been a fixture at the company for decades and helped shape a company strategy that has refocused on family fare after predecessors branched into more conventional Hollywood films.

abstract: The chairman of Walt Disney Studios, Dick Cook, announced his resignation late Friday as the division he has led struggled with profitability in a shifting media landscape.
snippet: The chairman of Walt Disney Studios, Dick Cook, announced his resignation late Friday as the division he has led struggled with profitability in a shifting media landscape.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES  The chairman of Walt Disney Studios, Dick Cook, resigned late Friday following struggles with profitability, creative focus and a shifting relationship with other Disney units.

headline.main: Film Chief at Disney Steps Down
headline.print_headline: Film Chief At Disney Steps Down

byline.original: By Brooks Barnes and Michael Cieply
